data.speaker: Mackenzie
data.dialogue: A jokester I see. Nice to meet you. I'm Mackenzie. Nice to actually meet you.

data.speaker: [NAME]
data.dialogue: Nice to meet you! We should probably go sit down.

data.speaker: Mackenzie
data.dialogue: Good idea. So tell me a bit about yourself, what do you do for a living?

options: I have a corner office with views of the entire city, drive a $500,000 vehicle, and that I'm paid to travel.
